text: 1. Look at the two gray tabletops. They appear to be different sizes. Click the box below the text 'Run' and they will cross each other and not change in size and when they cross you can see that they are the same size.
2. Stop the video by clicking below 'Run' again. You can click the box that says 'Exchange' to watch other videos.
Click home to navigate back to the home page. Click Show/Hide Example List to display a menu to the right navigate to another example from this page.
